Nightlight?

Time had passed since BlackStorm had been reprogramed to became 
Nightlight again. She slowly was waking up inside the quarters where 
Ydrassil had been locked her up, but still she was confused and 
memories spinning as hurricanes inside her mind. Who was she? 
BlackStorm? Nightlight? both?
